Package pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.coaster.repo

Interface MeasurementRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.reactive.ReactiveCrudRepository<Measurement,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Measurement,Integer>
@Repository public interface MeasurementRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.reactive.ReactiveCrudRepository<Measurement,Integer>
Repository of Measurement, used to store coaster measurement data.

      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      Returns:
      Flux of Measurements for the coaster

    • findTop10LatestByDeviceNameAndOwner

      @Query("select m.*\nfrom measurements m\njoin coasters c on m.device_name = c.device_name\nwhere m.device_name = :device and c.owner = :owner\norder by m.timestamp desc limit 10") reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Measurement> findTop10LatestByDeviceNameAndOwner(String deviceName, String owner)
      Fetch the 10 latest measurements for the coaster.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      owner - the coaster owner's username
      Returns:
      Flux of the latest Measurements for the coaster

    • findByDeviceNameAndOwnerAndIntervalGrouped

      @Query("select coalesce(sum(m.volume), 0) as volume, min(m.timestamp) as timestamp,\n date_trunc(:unit, m.timestamp at time zone :tz) as ts_group\nfrom measurements m\njoin coasters c on m.device_name = c.device_name\nwhere m.device_name = :device and c.owner = :owner and m.timestamp between :start and :end\ngroup by ts_group") reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Measurement> findByDeviceNameAndOwnerAndIntervalGrouped(String device, String owner, Instant start, Instant end, ChronoUnit unit, ZoneId tz)
      Fetch the measurements for the specified coaster and time period at time zone, grouped by the given time unit.
      Parameters:
      device - the device ID
      owner - the coaster owner's username
      start - the period start time
      end - the period end time
      unit - the time unit to group by
      tz - the period time zone
      Returns:
      Flux of grouped Measurements for the coaster

    • findDailySumVolumeForCoaster

      @Query("select coalesce(sum(volume), 0) from measurements\nwhere device_name = :device and date(timestamp at time zone :tz) = :date") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Float> findDailySumVolumeForCoaster(String device, LocalDate date, ZoneId tz)
      Fetch the sum of volume measurements for the given coaster and date.
      Parameters:
      device - the device ID
      date - the current date
      tz - the coaster time zone
      Returns:
      the sum of volume measurements
